publisher.publisher-name: Institute of Computational Mathematices and Scientific/Engineering Computing(ICMSEC) Chinese Academy of Sciences

title-group.article-title: A NONOVERLAPPING DOMAIN DECOMPOSITION METHOD FOR EXTERIOR 3-D PROBLEM

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: In this paper, a nonoverlapping domain decomposition method, which is based on the natural boundary reduction(cf. [4, 13, 15]), is developed to solve the boundary value problem in exterior three-dimensional domain of general shape. Convergence analyses both for the exterior spherical domain and the general exterior domain are made. Some numerical examples are also provided to illustrate the method.
